login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your TradeIQ Pro account
login.checkEmail: Please check your email and click the confirmation link before signing in.
login.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

signup.subtitle: Join TradeIQ Pro and start trading smarter
signup.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our
signup.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please click the link to verify your account.
signup.didntReceiveEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive reset instructions

resetPasswordRequest.title: Reset Your Password
resetPasswordRequest.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
resetPasswordRequest.checkEmail: Please check your email for password reset instructions
resetPasswordRequest.emailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}
resetPasswordRequest.instructionsSent: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the link to reset your password.
resetPasswordRequest.didntReceive: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
resetPasswordRequest.failedToSend: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
resetPasswordRequest.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Password updated successfully! Redirecting to login...
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully updated. You will be redirected to the login page shortly.
resetPassword.updateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again.
resetPassword.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
resetPassword.passwordRequirementsHint: Password must contain at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
resetPassword.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
resetPassword.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
resetPassword.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number
resetPassword.passwordNeedsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
resetPassword.linkExpiredDescription: Your password reset link has expired or is no longer valid. Please request a new password reset link.
resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.sessionExpiredDescription: Your password reset session has expired. Please request a new password reset link.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: We've sent a verification link to your email
verifyEmail.verifiedDescription: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now access your account.
verifyEmail.invalidDescription: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
verifyEmail.expiredDescription: Your verification link has expired. Please request a new verification email.
verifyEmail.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during verification. Please try again.
verifyEmail.missingParameters: Required parameters are missing from the verification link.
verifyEmail.emailRequired: Email address is required for verification.
